// By { "user" : { "name" : "abhishek gupta" } }
//

#include "iostream"
#include "stdio.h"
#include "vector"
#include "string"
#include "algorithm"

#define LLD long long int

using namespace std;
vector<LLD> v;
int n,k;
LLD cache[10001];

LLD dp(int i)
{
	if (i >= n)
		return 0;

	if (cache[i])
		return cache[i];
	else
	{
		cache[i] = max(dp(i + 1), v[i] + dp(i + k + 1));
		return cache[i];
	}
}

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	string in;
	
	while (getline(cin, in))
	{
		bool flag = true;
		for (std::string::iterator it = in.begin(); it != in.end() - 1; it++)
		{
			if (*it == '/' && *(it + 1) == '/')
			{
				cout << *it;
				flag = false;
			}
			else if (*it == '-' && *(it + 1) == '>' && flag)
			{
				cout << '.';
				it ++;
			}
			else
				cout << *it;
		}
		cout << *(in.end()-1);
			cout << endl;
		
	}
	
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
